name: Nuclear Powerplant Operator
description:
Try balance your core temperature!

Sell the energy to make money and fix the reactor

Fulfil the request of the government or get fired!

this game was made for the 76 mini jam https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-76-radiation

The theme is radiaton and the limitation is on-handed-controls

--- SO YOU CAN ONLY PLAY WITH THE MOUSE ---

--- THERE IS NO KEYBOAR CONTROLS ---

the game was made in a few hours so expect some bugs. But i tried my best!

the engine used: Godot https://godotengine.org/

all art and programming was made by me: puzzlebeast.

twitter: https://twitter.com/Puzzlebeast1

reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/puzzlebeast1

discord: puzzlebeast#9360

all the sound is from https://freesound.org/ under the cc0 license

Hope you like it!
